moves.3. Nc3: Going for the four knights game.
moves.5. Bg5: A very bad move for white. After 5...f6 either the bishop or knight is gone.
moves.6. Nd5: Not the best move. Black can't take the knight because the queen is pinned.
moves.6... g6: The losing move. I don't see a move that could be worse.
moves.7. Nf6+: White sees the chance to win early
moves.8. Bh6#: An 8 move mate. Remember that this game was played in the casual section of the tournament.
